A wrapper class for a vector of triangular filters.

Definition at line 23 of file MelFiltersBank.cpp.

Member Function Documentation

void Aquila::MelFiltersBank::applyAll ( spectrumType &  frameSpectrum,
unsigned int  N,
std::vector< double > &  filtersOutput 
) const

Processes frame spectrum through all filters.

If a filter is enabled, the dot product of filter spectrum and frame spectrum is computed. If the filter is disabled, 0 is inserted.

The output vector must be initialized and its size must be MELFILTERS.

Parameters:
frameSpectrum frame spectrum
N spectrum size
filtersOutput results vector
